content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #91372 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
I would go for P-critical personally, this breaks a ton of projects on a tier 1 target
agreed, a lot of core crates are affected by this, so P-critical is on point (but we're cool, a patch is on its way).

This issue is labelled a stable-to-stable regression, but I wonder how did it go for such a long time unnoticed? Actually, by looking at the history of related issues: #91082 and #90342 (and I think a few others) were fixed but not marked as regressions like this one #91372.
It is stable-to-beta and the beta cut was only recently.
oh I'm sorry :face_palm: thanks for the correction
Issue #91372 has been closed while requested for prioritization.
